name: Elemental Resonance: Shattering Ice
description:
During this Round, your current active character will deal +2 DMG for the next instance.
(You must have at least 2 Cryo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw: During this Round, your current active character will deal +2 DMG for the next instance.\n(You must have at least 2 <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced: During this Round, your current active character will deal +2 DMG for the next instance.\n(You must have at least 2 <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext: The frost flower blooms as a heart undivided.
